body: Am I the only one who had the "To be continiued" Song stuck in his head at the end?

It's kind of a pity when a couple of your biggest turn ons conflate with some of your greatest turn offs. I can't really blame the author; in terms of sexuality you're either into it or not; no way any kind of criticism would be objective here in that regard.
I liked the art very much, just saying: scat doesn't fit in too much here still fine though the people are such Basturds !!
It give me quite the lol
